attributes.action: stop paying child benefit for any more than 2 children per family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Families of 1 child should receive X amount of child benefit for that child. A second child should receive less child benefit. Any additional children should receive no child benefit.
   Existing families of 3 or more children should be unaffected if the scheme is changed- i.e. this should only apply to new families.
   Exceptions to the new scheme would be if the mother conceived multiple children at birth- i.e. twins or triplets etc would each receive child benefit, even if this brought the total number of children to 3 or more.
